Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Microtiter plate (12 strips, 8 microwells coated with recombinant tTG antigen)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Grifols Eu-tTG® IgA and IgG enzyme immunoassay kits for detection of anti-tissue transglutaminase antibodies as an aid in the diagnosis of celiac disease
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic enzyme immunoassays for the semi-quantitative detection of IgA or IgG antibodies against tissue transglutaminase (tTG) in human serum as an aid in the diagnosis of celiac disease, for use with other serological tests and clinical findings.
